query:
SELECT t.id, t.codigo, t.curso, t.instituicao, 
       (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM eventos e WHERE e.turmaId = t.id) as numEventos
FROM turmas t
WHERE t.codigo = '804' OR t.id IN (
  SELECT turmaId FROM formandos WHERE nome LIKE '%Aires%'
)
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 3WG3DCJNDgKq1ck.d12df11ceaba --database axWmxYbCBHHB5ETKSgA95A --execute SELECT t.id, t.codigo, t.curso, t.instituicao, 
       (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM eventos e WHERE e.turmaId = t.id) as numEventos
FROM turmas t
WHERE t.codigo = '804' OR t.id IN (
  SELECT turmaId FROM formandos WHERE nome LIKE '%Aires%'
)
